Title: Active Automation Service
Description:
Home Automation Service, for Z-Wave or IP wireless devices.
Written in C# to allow automation of devices with custom plugs being able to be added.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Active Automation Service will be a base platform written in C# to allow people to create their own plugins that can be ran by the service.
 
Will have the ability to add, edit and alter current plugins of you home automation service.
 
Z-Wave network with be staring point,
Then will look to add in IP handler for wireless devices
And possible other handlers.
 
If you wish to be part of this project then please contact a coordinator
using the contact member feature of codeplex.
